title: As an ADC main who plays Twitch and Trist, I can rationally tell you first hand...
body:
RIOT YOU BETTER GIVE ME MORE FUCKING BLUE CRYSTAL FOR MY RUNE BCUZ I VETERAN ARE MAD AND I WANT TEH GREY WARWICK URF SKINS AND FLOWERS LOAD BORDER FOR FRIEND TO SEE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!


https://imgur.com/p0GLpW6


https://i.imgur.com/kzFSoEs.gif[/img]

replies.body:
Phew lad, your desperation for up votes reeks.
https://i.imgur.com/2bIdAHz.jpg?noredirect
See .. I _knew_ you were one of us. Love you!
You thought that it was going to be just another bitch about ADCs post, but instead I got you with just another bitch about BE conversion post.
Omg you made my day :D thank you
I'm glad that you found the humor in it.

funny

btw, is grey warwick that rare to get from capsule now? i got grey ww in my second capsule
I got Medieval Twitch in my second capsule too.
I got him in first, then just champion shards (not like I complain, I actually want shards)
i want champ shards more than skin shards, i have around 50% of champs which gets real boring fast...

I know exactly what you feel, that's why i bought some champs for rp when they were on sale, and now I just need 4 champs more. (also just ignored all freaking runes, except for when tier 2 went for 1 IP)
I thought you could only get grey ww with the honor system and urfwick was from the replacement of ip.
That is correct. This is a multilayered shitpost.

Good post, aside from the fact that i don't want Grey Warwick.

I already have him.
Stare at gifs 3 and 4, the WW and Trump. Watch my puppets dance. Oh yeah, Trumpwick is coming, and they can have all my ip and BE for that shit.

If memes = upvotes than more memes = more upvotes.

I like your logic sir.
